carts.title: Carts
carts.subtitle: Manage your shopping carts
carts.noCartsDesc: Create your first cart to start shopping
carts.cartIdHint: Ask the cart owner for the share code to join.
carts.shareIdHint: Share this code with others so they can join your cart.
carts.emptyCartDesc: Start adding products to your cart
carts.loginForHistoryDesc: Your order history will be saved when you're signed in.
carts.loginForSuggestionsDesc: Get personalized product suggestions and better deals.

auth.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth.logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to sign out?
auth.saveRecoveryCodeDesc: Please save your recovery code below. You will need it to reset your password if you forget it.
auth.recoveryCodeWarning: Important: This code will only be shown once. Store it somewhere safe. Without it, you won't be able to recover your account.
auth.recoveryCodeHint: Write this down or store it in a password manager
auth.enterRecoveryCodeDesc: Enter the recovery code you saved when you registered your account.
auth.invalidRecoveryCode: Invalid recovery code. Please check and try again.
auth.createNewPasswordDesc: Enter your new password below. Make sure it's at least 6 characters long.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.passwordResetFailed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.passwordResetSuccessDesc: Your password has been changed. You can now log in with your new password.

home.title: Welcome to Cartify
home.subtitle: Your smart shopping companion. Compare prices, manage carts, and save money on every purchase.
home.cartsDesc: Create personal shopping lists or collaborate with family and friends on group carts. Track prices, find the best deals, and manage all your shopping in one place.
home.aboutUsDesc: Learn about our mission to help you save money on every shopping trip. We're dedicated to making smart shopping accessible to everyone.
home.contactUsDesc: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to our team and we'll respond as soon as possible.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Learn more about Cartify
aboutUs.missionDesc: We help you save money by comparing grocery prices across different stores, making it easy to find the best deals for your shopping cart.
aboutUs.visionDesc: To become the go-to platform for smart grocery shopping, helping families save money and make informed purchasing decisions.
aboutUs.valuesDesc: Transparency, accuracy, and user-first approach are at the core of everything we do.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: Get in touch with us
contactUs.haveQuestionDesc: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contactUs.name: Name
contactUs.subject: Subject
contactUs.comingSoonDesc: Our contact form is currently under development. Please use the contact information on the left to reach us.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings
profile.accountDesc: Edit your account settings and change your password here.
profile.usernameHint: Your username will be visible to other users.
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
profile.passwordHidden: Your password is hidden for security. Click 'Change Password' to update it.
profile.emailCannotChange: Your email address cannot be changed.
profile.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters

myCart.title: My Cart
myCart.overviewDesc: Manage your shopping lists and view completed carts.
myCart.completedCartsHint: Completed carts will appear here after you finish shopping.
myCart.noHistoryHint: Finished shopping trips will appear here.
myCart.cartCompleted: This shopping trip has been saved to history
myCart.emptyCartDesc: Start adding products to your cart
myCart.loginToCalculate: Please log in to calculate prices
myCart.loginToComplete: Please log in to save completed carts
myCart.loginForHistoryDesc: Your shopping history will be saved when you're signed in.
myCart.loginForSuggestionsDesc: Get personalized product suggestions and better deals.

groupCarts.title: Group Carts
groupCarts.subtitle: Collaborate on shopping with others
groupCarts.noGroupsDesc: Create or join a group to start collaborating
groupCarts.groupIdHint: Ask the group owner for the Group ID to join.
groupCarts.shareIdHint: Share this ID with others so they can join your group.
groupCarts.loginToAccess: Please log in to access Group Carts

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.notFoundDesc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errors.unauthorized: You need to be logged in to access this page.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this resource.
